ygData.subject: Re: How to access remote heritrix.
ygData.msgSnippet: If you have the WebUI enabled, then just connect using your web browser for http://XXXXXX:8080 Where XXXXXX is the IP address of the Heritrix machine, and 8080

If you have the WebUI enabled, then just connect using your web
browser for=
 http://XXXXXX:8080

Where XXXXXX is the IP address of the Heritrix machine=
, and 8080 is
the port number assigned to the WebUI.

Reference the heritri=
x.properties file in the conf folder.

>   please send me the required step=
s  and resources to do this.
